content.question: The revenues section of the table can best be used to illustrate which of the following continuities between pre-1900 and post-1900 European imperialism?

choices.label: Competition between European colonial powers encouraged imperial expansion.
Some African peoples successfully resisted colonial economic exploitation.
Colonial powers directly subsidized most of the expenditures needed to maintain their colonies.
Colonial powers sought to extract wealth and economic resources from the colonized peoples.

content.answer: Colonial powers sought to extract wealth and economic resources from the colonized peoples.

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Identify the evidence used in a source to support an argument.
